channel.title: Forum that can use webclients? REP+ STILL NEED HELP
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me some [b][i]FREE[/i][/b] forum hosters that can do webclients using HTML?
I tried using x10hosting but its being gay and wont let me do anything, ive tried forumotion but it didnt work either could someone tell me a website that does webclients really well? its a 562 server by the way.. and dont say Rs-Ps cause they sucks lol..
REP+

item.title: Forum that can use webclients? REP+ STILL NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

forummotion.com

Free forum - forummotion.com

Free forum Discuss, research and identify 20th Century pottery, glass, fine art, lighting, furniture, and decorative arts. Free forum : Yet another site for us lol, this time made by Bacon!
